metadata.name: My Fighter / Mi Luchita
metadata.description:
Sometimes I look at this photo and I start crying because you're so far away. I see myself in your eyes. I miss you. Even though today you're still here, I know there will be a time when you won't be here anymore and it breaks my whole heart. I love you grandma. I loved you from the moment I met you. I spent my first New Years asleep by your side. I grew up in your house on the weekends. Until one day a border kept us apart. 

I'm here now in another country just trying to make you proud. I feel you in my heart. I wear the bracelet and necklace you gave me everywhere I go. I have all the best parts of you. Your DNA is my DNA.

Thank you for being my motivation.
Thank you for your love and for believing in me. 
I will love you today, tomorrow, and forever.
